title: 1880's Kimball Superlative Cigarette Slide and Shell Outer Shell For Sale
author: Archive

posts.post_title: 1880's Kimball Superlative Cigarette Slide and Shell Outer Shell For Sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jon Canfield
I have up for sale an outer shell for Kimball's "Superlative Cigarettes".  While this outer shell is missing its inner slide, the outer shell is in near perfect condition with a mint 1883 tax stamp (with undated overprint)on back.  This would be a perfect to compliment your N184 card or set (See Dave F's card for sale below!).

$40.00 shipped.
